doc:
Lola Gaos https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lola_Gaos 0 Lola Gaos, (real name: Dolores Gaos González-Pola), (Valencia, 2 December 1921 - † Madrid, 4 July 1993) was a Spanish film, television and theatre actress. Famous with her works with Luis Buñuel but specially the film Furtivos where she played the dominant mother. Lola_Gaos , ( real_name : Dolores_Gaos_González-Pola ) , ( Valencia , 2_December_1921 - †_Madrid , 4_July_1993 ) was a_Spanish_film_,_television_and_theatre_actress . Famous with her_works with Luis_Buñuel but specially the_film_Furtivos where she played the_dominant_mother .
